attributes.action: Would like the government to put a stop to the overbuild and huge extensions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I and I suspect hundreds of homeowners are suffering distress and unhappiness  thanks to the Birmingham Planning Department constantly ignoring objections from residents against the huge extensions and overbuild on some properties. It is now time for the government to take these concerns seriously and stop ignoring the peoples plight.  I would like to see new rules and regulations drawn up to reduce the size of extentions.
